the amplitude contour of another audio
signal called the modulator the
modulator source is generally something
with a clear rhythmic character such as
speech or drums while the carrier is
typically a harmonically rich
synthesizer such as a string or pad the
most familiar application of a vocoder
is to create talking synthesizer or
